text: The Women’s Equality Party was a political party. It was founded in July 2014 in New York by Christine Quinn, New York Governor Andrew Cuomo, and Lieutenant Governor candidate Kathy Hochul. == Mission == * To guarantee equal pay for women across the state == Supporters == * Nita Lowey * Grace Meng * Lena Dunham * Christie Brinkley * Sandra Lee == Other websites == * Official website * http://fortune.com/2014/10/30/womens-equality-party-new-york/ * http://www.capitalnewyork.com/tags/womens-equality-party * http://www.nystateofpolitics.com/2014/07/democrats-unveil-womens-equality- party/ Category:Political parties in the United States Category:2014 establishments in New York (state) Category:2010s establishments in New York (state)
title: Women’s Equality Party
